name: Corky's
description:
Game made for Global Gam Jam 2020

Corky is a bartender with a tentacle and a leaking water issue.

Move with A & D or Arrows

Aim with mouse

Select/Drink/Plug Leak with Left Mouse Button

Made by:

Robert “Rupert” Waite, Bill Jones, James Dougherty, Myka Donati

Made with:

Unity and FL Studio
